statements: SELECT * FROM audio_samples
SELECT sample_name, sample_length FROM audio_samples WHERE sample_length > 5
SELECT sample_name, sample_length FROM audio_samples ORDER BY sample_length DESC
SELECT sample_name FROM audio_samples WHERE sample_length BETWEEN 10 AND 100
SELECT * FROM audio_samples ORDER BY sample_id
SELECT * FROM audio_samples WHERE sample_id = 1
SELECT sample_name, sample_length FROM audio_samples ORDER BY sample_length DESC
SELECT sample_id, sample_name FROM audio_samples WHERE sample_length > 1000
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, sample_length FROM audio_samples WHERE sample_name LIKE 'Guitar%'
SELECT sample_id, sample_name, LENGTH(sample_data) AS data_size FROM audio_samples
SELECT * FROM audio_samples
SELECT sample_name, sample_type FROM audio_samples WHERE sample_duration > 3.5
SELECT sample_name, sample_duration FROM audio_samples ORDER BY sample_duration DESC
SELECT composition_name, composition_genre FROM compositions WHERE composition_length < 5.0
SELECT composition_name FROM compositions ORDER BY composition_name
SELECT * FROM audio_samples WHERE sample_type = 'vocal' ORDER BY sample_duration DESC
SELECT composition_name, composition_genre FROM compositions WHERE composition_length > 5
SELECT sample_name, sample_duration FROM audio_samples WHERE sample_type = 'instrumental' LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM compositions WHERE composition_genre = 'rock' ORDER BY composition_length ASC
SELECT composition_name, composition_length FROM compositions WHERE composition_genre = 'pop'
SELECT * FROM audio_samples;
SELECT sample_name, sample_file_path FROM audio_samples ORDER BY sample_name DESC;
SELECT id, composition_name FROM compositions WHERE composer_name = 'Bach';
SELECT username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM audio_samples JOIN compositions ON audio_samples.id = compositions.id;
SELECT * FROM audio_samples WHERE sample_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY sample_name DESC;
SELECT composition_name, composer_name FROM compositions WHERE composer_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY composition_name ASC;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM audio_samples WHERE sample_name LIKE '%sample%' AND sample_file_path LIKE '/path/to/file%';
SELECT * FROM compositions WHERE composer_name = 'Mozart' AND composition_file_path IS NOT NULL ORDER BY composition_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM audio_samples;
SELECT name, artist FROM audio_samples WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT user_id, username, country FROM users WHERE date_joined >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT composition_id, title, artist, length FROM compositions ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(favorite_id) AS total_favorites FROM favorites GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_favorites > 5;
SELECT * FROM audio_samples WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, artist, duration FROM audio_samples WHERE duration > 300 ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT audio_id, genre FROM audio_samples WHERE genre IN ('Pop', 'Hip Hop') ORDER BY audio_id;
SELECT name, artist FROM audio_samples JOIN favorites ON audio_samples.audio_id = favorites.audio_id WHERE favorites.user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY date_joined DESC;
SELECT * FROM audio_samples;
SELECT sample_name, sample_url FROM audio_samples ORDER BY sample_name;
SELECT id, sample_name, sample_url FROM audio_samples WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM compositions WHERE composed_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT composition_name, created_on FROM compositions ORDER BY created_on DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM audio_samples;
SELECT sample_name, sample_url FROM audio_samples WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sample_name, sample_url FROM audio_samples ORDER BY sample_name DESC;
SELECT composition_name, composed_by, created_on FROM compositions WHERE composed_by IS NOT NULL;
SELECT users.username, compositions.composition_name FROM users JOIN compositions ON users.id = compositions.id;
